text:
Aww yeah! Based on the popularity of our first 
lesson, and because you guys have been begging

us for another, today we are learning English 
with the world's favorite underwater cartoon

Spongebob Squarepants. So, let's 
dive below the sea and learn
English.

All right, now before we learn with this clip, 
I want to let you know that if you're new here,

every single week we make fun lessons, just like 
this one, so that you can learn to understand

fast speaking natives. Without getting lost, 
without missing the jokes and without subtitles!

Just like our fan Faustyna, who says she loves 
learning with animation, and that our lessons

have helped her take her English to a higher 
level. And will help you in reaching your English

learning goals too. You can join over 3 million 
learners from all around the world by hitting

that Subscribe button and the Bell below and 
you won't miss a single one of our new lessons.

So this last Thursday was Thanksgiving in 
the United States, and one of the things

that we do on this holiday is we reflect 
about the things that we're grateful for.

So, we here at RealLife English are just 
so thankful for all the great things

that have happened this year, and we're truly 
appreciative to all of our fans and students,

and all of the support that you have given us. 
So to show that thanks we want to offer you the

opportunity to make 2021 your year for English 
fluency, with a huge 33% discount on our RealLife

Native Immersion Course. Now different from our 
other course Fluent with Friends, in the RealLife

Native Immersion Course we will give you materials 
that will help you to advance your English fluency

with fun real-life conversations between me and 
other fluency coaches. So, if you want to speak

English confidently and understand natives, 
then why not give it a try? Remember we have a

30-day money back guarantee, so if you are not 
absolutely satisfied in the first few weeks,

we'll give you 100% of your money back. Although 
we know that you won't need it, so to learn more

and sign up just click up here or down description 
below, and remember to get that huge discount all

you have to do is use the coupon code "THANK YOU" 
at checkout. Now, don't wait, this special Black

Friday Sale ends on Monday. I look forward 
to meeting you inside the Fluency Circle.
